name: Farm Control
description:
------------------ Story ------------------

Animals have escaped from the barn as the farmer left the door opened during the night. The animals are now panicking and need your help to get to safety.

------------------ How To Play ------------------
1- Click Anywhere on the field to create a bubble that repels friendly animals away from it.
2- Enable fence editor 'e' and rotate fences 'r' then place them using the right mouse button.
3- Enable Farmer editor 'q' and place him with space button on certain levels to attract friendly animals for a period of time.
4- Guide the animals to the barn and the birds to the gazebo.
5- Press Play and enjoy : )
